need_candidates.comment_requirements:
Requirements:
• Degree in Graphic Design or a related field. Ongoing education/certification
• 1+ years of experience in Graphic Design, must provide a portfolio
• Availability to work online with Teams between 6:30pm-9:30pm Tokyo time, 10:30am-1:30pm Europe, 9:30am-12:30pm London time
• Proficiency in industry-standard design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite.
• Excellent remote communication and collaboration skills.
• Experience in the travel industry related field, or working for startup apps is a plus.
• The salary for the role is TBD for 15 hours per week.

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
Dear Hilla,

My name is Marina, will be your manager in Remote Helpers from now. Nice to get to know you)

I hope this message finds you and the team at Gorilla Digital Advertising in great spirits.

As we continue to support your projects with Anton and Maya, we’re keen to hear how everything is going. Your feedback is invaluable in ensuring we maintain the good standard of support you expect from us.

Additionally, we're excited to share that we've expanded our proposals at Remote Helpers. With our new application rh-s.com, we now feature a wider range of candidates and have opened new departments to updated serve diverse needs. Whether it's additional support in digital marketing, content creation, or any other service, we're here to assist.

Could there be any additional areas where Gorilla Digital Advertising might benefit from external support? We’d love to explore how our expanded capabilities can further contribute to your success.

Looking forward to your feedback and continuing our fruitful collaboration.

Warm regards,

Marina

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
Dear Hilla,

I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to follow up on my previous email and further discuss the exciting opportunities we have for collaboration.

As mentioned, we’re committed to ensuring that Anton and Maya continue to deliver exceptional support for your projects at Gorilla Digital Advertising. We are always eager to receive your feedback and understand any additional needs you may have.

In addition to our expanded service offerings, I’d like to highlight our affiliate partnership program once again. This program is designed to provide mutual benefits by allowing you to earn bonuses through referring potential clients to us. It's a straightforward way to leverage your network and gain additional value from our collaboration.

You can find more details about the program here: https://rh-s.com/affiliate. We believe this could be a fantastic opportunity for you and Gorilla Digital Advertising to benefit further from our partnership.

Please let us know if you have any questions or if there are specific areas where you think our services could add value. We’re here to support you in every possible way.

Looking forward to your response and to continuing our successful partnership.

Warm regards,

Marina
Remote Helpers

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
Dear Hilla,

I’m Ekaterina, and I’ll be your dedicated manager here at Remote Helpers moving forward. It’s a pleasure to connect with you!

I hope this message finds you and the team at Gorilla Digital Advertising doing exceptionally well.

As we continue to collaborate on your projects with Anton and Maya, I’d love to hear your thoughts on how things are progressing. Your feedback is crucial in helping us ensure that we’re meeting the high standards you expect from us.

I’m also excited to share some updates! At Remote Helpers, we’ve recently expanded our services, and our updated platform, rh-s.com, now showcases a broader pool of talented candidates and new departments designed to meet diverse business needs. Whether you’re looking for additional support in digital marketing, content creation, or other areas, we’re here to help.

Are there any specific areas where you feel Gorilla Digital Advertising could benefit from extra assistance? I’d be delighted to explore how our expanded offerings can further support your success.

Looking forward to hearing from you and continuing our productive partnership.

Best regards,

type.name: Follow Up

client_accounting_note.note:
15.06.23
Діяльність компанії: Маркетингова компанія для різних галузей, здебільшого ресторанна сфера. Вони пропонують: графічний дизайн, веб дизайн, дизайн продукту, рекламу та маркетинг у соц.медіа, СЕО, обробка фото для соціальних мереж. У СРМ: зараз з ними працюються  копірайтер і смм а ще раніше працювала веб дизайнер. Пошта: по інвойсах. Оплата по різному. За лютий і березень заплатили у квітні.

client_candidates.comment:
I have good news we would like to see some candidates for the following tasks:

 

Tasks

Calendar management of the MD
booking appointments with externals and internals (access to outlook calendar)
moving appointments
coordination work week of MD
Organization/coordination of business travel
flight booking (internal access to flight booking system STAFF TRAVEL)
hotel booking (access to internal hotel booking system HRS or direct booking)
 

Requirements:

We would like to work with someone in long-term. We would like to train him/her on these tasks (give access to our internal tools) and continuous working with this person over some time. E.g. a candidate who is student and only is interested to work for like a few months would not be ideal.

Hi Marina

 

How are you doing?

I have good news we would like to see some candidates for the following tasks:

 

Tasks

Calendar management of the MD
booking appointments with externals and internals (access to outlook calendar)
moving appointments
coordination work week of MD
Organization/coordination of business travel
flight booking (internal access to flight booking system STAFF TRAVEL)
hotel booking (access to internal hotel booking system HRS or direct booking)
 

Requirements:

We would like to work with someone in long-term. We would like to train him/her on these tasks (give access to our internal tools) and continuous working with this person over some time. E.g. a candidate who is student and only is interested to work for like a few months would not be ideal.

Myroslava introduce herself very good and she had needed experience for client. He choose her among all the candidates , and would like to set up one more call with his CEO and Myroslava. As soon as we will have one more meeting we will set up a starting day.

We interviewed Myroslava for Lufthansa Aviation Training Switzerland company one more time.

https://www.rh-s.com/sales/lead-generation-manager/myroslava/

It was a call to introduce Myroslva to the company's CEO whom she will assist when will be hired. They had a friendly talk and discussed tasks which they wanted to delegate to Miroslava. 
Myroslva will be helping with booking flights and hotels, organising different types of meetings and events for the company CEO, communicate with assistants of the other CEO companies and assist with daily tasks. They prefer only a long-term relationship and do not need 2-month employee, we discussed it and Myroslava assured them that she is very interested in working with such a big company. Also, they already invited Myroslalva to visit their office in Zurich and will take care of her flights and accommodation. But they will discuss everything only after signing the Agreement. 
After the meeting, they asked to take a time to think internaly about when it's better to start and will email us today.

Starting Date : Next week

SM Julia
SA Marina

need_candidates.comment_requirements: So they need a person who will be capable to do such tasks as: agenda planning, booking the flights for him, arranging some meetings, doing the tasks in Excel, etc.
